World.headline: 4.3 magnitude earthquake strikes Afghanistan
World.summary: A 4.3 magnitude earthquake has struck Afghanistan. Updates are ongoing as authorities assess the impact and any potential damage or casualties.

He advocates for global sharing of AI's economic benefits but insists that critical compute power must be kept out of authoritarian control to maintain global stability.

World.headline: Ex-Lovers found dead in locked car in Noida, gun recovered; WhatsApp message hints at murder-suicide
